queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

select date_format( dates.date_field, '%Y-%m-%d' ) 'DATE_FIELD', (ifnull( assets_planned, 0 )+ ifnull( assets_abroad, 0 ))/assets_count*100 'ASSETS_PLAN', assets_count/assets_count*100 'ASSETS_THEO', ( assets_count - ifnull( assets_NONOPS, 0 ) )/assets_count*100 'ASSETS_OPS',
yearly_opscount/assets_count*100 'ASSETS_AVG_OPS', ( assets_count - ifnull( assets_NONOPS, 0 )- ifnull( assets_planned, 0 )- ifnull( assets_abroad, 0 ) )/assets_count*100 'ASSETS_AVAILABLE' , if ((assets_count-ifnull(assets_NONOPS,0)-ifnull(assets_abroad,0))>=ifnull(assets_planned,0),100,((assets_count-ifnull(assets_NONOPS,0)-ifnull(assets_abroad,0))/ifnull(assets_planned,0))*100) as 'Effectiveness' , round((ifnull(assets_planned,0)+ ifnull(assets_abroad,0))/(assets_count - ifnull(assets_NONOPS, 0))*100,2) 'FleetUsage' from ( select date_field, date_tk from damrsysl_calendar_dates where date_field >= DATE_SUB( current_date, interval 365 day ) and date_field <= DATE_ADD( current_date, interval 10 day ) ) dates left join( select date_field, date_tk, count( ASSET ) as assets_count from mrqr_assets ma inner join daotg4_functions_global on ma.nsn = daotg4_functions_global.nsn and ma.function = daotg4_functions_global.function, damrsysl_calendar_dates where ma.HIGHER_ASSET is null and daotg4_functions_global.top = 1 and ma.function like 'VDSC' and ma.STATUS not in( 'D', 'A', 'B', 'E', 'O' ) and( ma.STORE not like('%VE') or ma.STORE is null ) and date_field >= DATE_SUB( current_date, interval 365 day ) and date_field <= DATE_ADD( current_date, interval 10 day ) and MFRDATE <= date_field and ma.organism like '%' group by date_tk ) exist_sum on dates.date_tk = exist_sum.date_tk left join( select date_field, date_tk, count( ASSET ) as assets_abroad from mrqr_assets ma inner join daotg4_functions_global on ma.nsn = daotg4_functions_global.nsn and ma.function = daotg4_functions_global.function inner join mrqr_organisms mo on ma.organism = mo.organism, damrsysl_calendar_dates where ma.HIGHER_ASSET is null and daotg4_functions_global.top = 1 and ma.function like 'VDSC' and ma.STATUS not in( 'D', 'A', 'B', 'E', 'O' ) and( ma.STORE not like('%VE') or ma.STORE is null ) and mo.parent = '0Z' and date_field >= DATE_SUB( current_date, interval 365 day ) and date_field <= DATE_ADD( current_date, interval 10 day ) and MFRDATE <= date_field and ma.organism like '%' group by date_tk ) deployed_sum on dates.date_tk = deployed_sum.date_tk left join( select date_field, date_tk, sum( mum.nbr_of_assets ) as assets_planned from mrqr_mission_units_material mum inner join mrqr_mission_participating_units mpu on mum.omu_id = mpu.omu_id, damrsysl_calendar_dates where mum.function like 'VDSC' and date_field >= DATE_SUB( current_date, interval 365 day ) and date_field < DATE_ADD( current_date, interval 10 day ) and date_field >= mpu.start_date and date_field < mpu.end_date and mpu.PARTICIPATING_UNIT like '%' group by date_tk ) plan_sum on plan_sum.date_tk = dates.date_tk left join( select date_tk, round( avg( opscount ), 0 ) as yearly_opscount from ( select mrqr_assets.function, date_tk, count( mrqr_assets.ASSET ) as opscount from mrqr_assets inner join daotg4_functions_global on mrqr_assets.nsn = daotg4_functions_global.nsn and mrqr_assets.function = daotg4_functions_global.function inner join mrqr_aosac_intervals on mrqr_assets.ASSET = mrqr_aosac_intervals.ASSET, damrsysl_calendar_dates where daotg4_functions_global.top = 1 and mrqr_assets.STATUS not in( 'D', 'A', 'B', 'E', 'O' ) and( mrqr_assets.STORE not like('%VE') or mrqr_assets.STORE is null ) and mrqr_aosac_intervals.STATUS in( 'O', 'Q' ) and ADDTIME( date_field, '09:00:00.0' )>= STARTDATE and ADDTIME( date_field, '09:00:00.0' )< ENDDATE and date_field >= DATE_SUB( current_date, interval 1 year ) and date_field < current_date and mrqr_assets.function = 'VDSC' and mrqr_assets.organism like '%' group by function, date_tk ) yearly_sub group by function ) avg_ops on left( avg_ops.date_tk, 1 )= left( dates.date_tk, 1 ) left join( select mrqr_assets.function, date_tk, count( mrqr_assets.ASSET ) as assets_NONOPS from mrqr_assets inner join daotg4_functions_global on mrqr_assets.nsn = daotg4_functions_global.nsn and mrqr_assets.function = daotg4_functions_global.function inner join mrqr_aosac_intervals on mrqr_assets.ASSET = mrqr_aosac_intervals.ASSET, damrsysl_calendar_dates where daotg4_functions_global.top = 1 and mrqr_assets.STATUS not in( 'D', 'A', 'B', 'E', 'O' ) and( mrqr_assets.STORE not like('%VE') or mrqr_assets.STORE is null ) and not(mrqr_aosac_intervals.STATUS in( 'O', 'Q' )) and ADDTIME( date_field, '09:00:00.0' )>= STARTDATE and ADDTIME( date_field, '09:00:00.0' ) < ENDDATE and date_field >= DATE_SUB( current_date, interval 1 year ) and date_field < current_date and mrqr_assets.function = 'VDSC' and mrqr_assets.organism like '%' group by function, date_tk ) inops_sum on dates.date_tk = inops_sum.date_tk where ( length( replace( replace( 'pFUNCTION', '%', '' ), '_', '' ) )>= 2 ) and dates.date_field <= date( now() )
